sys_script_include.description: Script for redirecting a customer to the School Office Supplies Management portal
sys_script_include.name: RedirectToPortal

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_23da58919784311015c7fbafe153aff4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1080238_school_o.RedirectToPortal</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Script for redirecting a customer to the School Office Supplies Management portal</description><name>RedirectToPortal</name><script><![CDATA[var RedirectToPortal = Class.create();
RedirectToPortal.prototype = {
  process: function() {
    // Get the current user
    var user = gs.getUser();

    // Check if the user meets the criteria to be redirected
    if (user && user.hasRole('x_1080238_school_o.customer')) {
      // Redirect the user to the portal URL
      gs.sendRedirect('https://dev168380.service-now.com/sos');
    }
  },

  type: 'RedirectToPortal'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>johniel.comanda</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-14 07:27:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>23da58919784311015c7fbafe153aff4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RedirectToPortal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="School Office Supplies Management" source="x_1080238_school_o">a783b0689700311015c7fbafe153af76</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="School Office Supplies Management">a783b0689700311015c7fbafe153af76</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_23da58919784311015c7fbafe153aff4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>johniel.comanda</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-18 08:20:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
